Reviews.Content: stayed abba hotel 4 nights april 2012 basic double ensuite bathroom sink window breakfast ham cheese tomatoes cereals juice eggs apples bananas tea coffee staff helpful nice towels changed daily major complaints amsterdam stay admire hotel hotel shower sleep easiest reach hotel connexion bus 197 form airport leidseplein enter street 200m hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cheap sleep in the city”
Reviews.Author: SnowInBrussels
Reviews.Content: amsterdam hotels notoriously expensive rare value money direct tramline station close city centre bars restaurants grocery store clean feels safe secure heavy note 2 steep flights steps leading entrance youre light sleeper eg coughing creaking stairs disturb bring earplugs buffet breakfast adequate

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Tone8906
Reviews.Content: hotel abba easy nearly directly opposite tram stop route 1 hotel clean tidy breakfast buffet style basic cereals toast cheese ham salami etc adequate feed day bathroom outside door reasonable size nice balcony overlooking quadrangle amsterdam value money 33 euro night twin

Reviews.Title: “3 days in Amsterdam, Abba is a good deal”

Reviews.Content: double shared bathroom friend didnt realize shared bathroom basically bathroom shared 3 guys bigger stalls showers 2 helpful guess theyd males females sharing little hard shower morning ran toilet paper day fortunately travel mate roll didnt leave dont guys bathroom gross day staff didnt tidy paper refilled definitely remember shower shoes drain shower slow wastebasket cleanest ive seen worse bad money faced street noisy bad hear tram running wasnt populated people noise tram flashes lights overhead cables sparking travel buddy mentioned didnt bother tram front hotel convenient quick city little grocery convenient stop pick bottled water snacks tiny surcharge plastic water bottles deposit 50 cents cashier explained looked confused cost sign shelf theres machine towards store bring empties refund wont crushed bottles found breakfast breads sliced cheese ham boiled eggs jams cereal coffee juice space people trying food run staff busily trying replacement staff pretty friendly nice pretty deal overall amsterdam stay didnt try section town

Reviews.Title: “Best service, great location”

Reviews.Content: hotel abba pleasant surprise boyfriend stayed nights extremely bright clean didnt mind sharing bathroom couple door hostel people mainly sleep meaning hotel stays quiet hours day breakfast offered guests theres selection breads sandwich meats tea coffee juices cereal fruit guests clean hotel staff fresh loved location hotel isnt terms restaurants cafes vicinity floor hotel excellent located street tram station makes traveling simple easy nightlife leidseplein 10 minute walk locations quick tram hotel abba staff extremely friendly helpful giving advice warnings pay items complain steep winding stairs bit tiring days walk average person handle definitely plan staying hotel abba future visits amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Its a hostel, not a hotel. For Amsterdam it was adequate but not central. The stairs were intense.”
Reviews.Author: RonaldFonjo
Reviews.Content: stayed nights october 2010 2 people single bath clean dormlike central steep stairs friendly staff free breakfast pay wifi uncomfortable bed sparce glad amsterdam price paid little
